Name: Hell Space
About the game: Story: Powerful artificial intelligence 'Supervisor' is out of control and began to remodel all living organisms to the cybernetic life forms, thus threatening the entire human race. You are a Space Marine. You need to get to the bunker of the capsule that can neutralize all enemy sites in the region. Of course you need to kill all monsters on your way. Your task is to destroy enemies in the air of urban platform, factory red zone, a space station, and the ancient pyramids. TO ARMS! BECOME A HERO! This is the 360 degrees indie slasher with the top view and old schooll graphics. The chronicles of Pandora: - Funny humor - Linear story with colourful special effects - Dominate the battlefield with powerful cannons - Fight on four thematic levels - Good old slasher style which reminiscent Crimsonland and Alien shooter
